name: Broken Times
description:
The future has come, you just picked a loan of 12.000 pounds, brought a whole new set of machinery, and is ready to make your way into the future. But, wait... you brought so much stuff that now you are broke. And now... guess what?... who do you think has to make all that cash-back alone?

  • Cooperative - Enjoy being broke together.
  • SinglePlayer - Fail at your first enterprise free of charge!
  • Step Motion - That's right, crazy animation Style.
  • Black & White Asthetic - 30's inspired film effects.
  • Compound Interest - An always growing debt!! You'll love it.
  • Buy - Trade prices on your telegraph in order to get the best products ever.
  • Transform - Make Raw materials into some fine Clocks to be sold.
  • Refinining -  Refine items using code inputs in order to get even more profit.
  • Sell - Make sure you get those clocks to the right hands and get your investment back.

Hey hey, thank you for checking out this game.

This game was submitted to the GMTK 2020 GameJam

I hope you enjoy it :)

  • The game has from 12 to 20 minutes of gameplay.
  • You can play it with a controller :)
  • You can play it on Local Coop.
